div.p: I think if you’re willing to put a day’s work in and you’re passionate about what you do and you’re willing to graft and you’re willing to learn
and listen to your mentors and stuff like that I think that for me means everything and having a little bit of life experience
as an employer I’d be looking for that, I’m not interested in exams to be honest, I’m not, I appreciate there’s got to be a basic level
of reading, writing and stuff like that but do you need A*’s to get on in life? I don’t think so I really don’t.
